details.title: Details
details.description: Structural features, construction year, and technical information provided within the project scope along with descriptions about the physical structure of the residence.

features.description: Detailed information about the interior and exterior equipment, structural features, and living spaces offered by the residence.

panoramicView.title: 360 Virtual Tour
panoramicView.description: An interactive viewing experience that allows you to explore all areas of the property in detail through a virtual tour.

location.title: Location

floorPlans.description: View all areas of the property on technical drawings; access necessary certificates and documents.

contactPage.title: Reaching Obudur is very easy!
contactPage.subtitle: Obudur provides a reliable foundation for independent real estate agents who want to grow their business.
contactPage.description1: We are with you every step of the way, from training to technology, from marketing to corporate identity.
contactPage.description2: If you don't want to be alone when opening your own office, apply: the support you are looking for is here.
contactPage.officesSubtitle: Offices of our brands working with Obudur.

becomePartnerPage.title: Your dream office, a strong brand, That's It.
becomePartnerPage.subtitle: Obudur provides a reliable foundation for independent real estate agents who want to grow their business.
becomePartnerPage.description1: We are with you every step of the way, from training to technology, from marketing to corporate identity.
becomePartnerPage.description2: If you don't want to be alone when opening your own office, apply: the support you are looking for is here.

careerPage.title: If you're looking for a new beginning, Obudur!
careerPage.subtitle: If you want to turn a new page in your career, you're in the right place.
careerPage.description1: If you're looking for a team that values your talents, cares about your ideas, and believes in growing together: That's it.
careerPage.description2: At Obudur, you'll find not just a job, but a future you'll journey together.
